name: MG Maritime
goal:
Consulting in the maritime- and marine arena. Operations include a wide range of maritime activities, such as maritime safety (security) information sharing (maritime information), maritime operational Activity (coast guard, law enforcement, naval, search and rescue and maritime).

Consulting services are for example, presentations and lectures, individual expert advice and participation in expert groups, studies, project management, maritime events mapping and analysis.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Communication, Development, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Common Information Sharing Environment (CISE)

European Maritime Security Strategy (EUMSS)

Coast Guard development

Remote Piloted Arial system development
